content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used "google" command to search for exploration and learning resources and received a list of links. I then used the "browse_website" command to visit the National Geographic website and gather information. The website offers a collection of articles, videos, podcasts, and travel guides covering a range of topics including nature, travel, history, culture, and science. However, there is no direct information about exploration and learning resources.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://www.nationalgeographic.com/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.nationalgeographic.com/", "question": "What is the summary of the National Geographic website?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : a collection of articles, videos, podcasts, and travel guides on various topics such as environment, animals, history, culture, and travel, published on the National Geographic website. It also includes information about the National Geographic Society\'s nonprofit work and ways to support their mission.', type='action_result')]
"""
